changelog.title: Network Master Certification Path
changelog.description: New gamified progression system: complete quizzes, modules, and flashcards to unlock the Interactive Textbook.

changelog.title: Interactive Networking Textbook
changelog.description: 2500+ line comprehensive textbook covering Chapters 7-20 with VLAN simulator, subnet calculator, and per-chapter quizzes.

changelog.title: Midterm Exam System
changelog.description: 20-question timed exam (45 min, 70% pass) with localStorage-based unlock mechanism for gated content.
